text.0: let me win glory agni in our battles enkindling thee may we support our bodies.
text.1: may the four regions bend and bow before me with thee for guardian may we win in combat.
text.2: may all the gods be on my side in battle the maruts led by indra viṣṇu agni.
text.3: mine be the middle airs extended region and may the wind blow favouring these my wishes.
text.4: may the gods grant me riches may the blessing and invocation of the gods assist me.
text.5: foremost in fight be the divine invokers may we unwounded have brave heroes round us.
text.6: for me let them present all mine oblations and let my minds intention be accomplished.
text.7: may i he guiltless of the least transgression and all ye gods do ye combine to bless us.
text.8: ye six divine expanses grant us freedom here all ye gods acquit yourselves like heroes.
text.9: let us not lose our children or our bodies let us not benefit the foe king soma.
text.10: baffling the wrath of our opponents agni guard us as our infallible protector.
text.11: let these thy foes turn back and seek their houses and let their thought who watch at home be ruined.
text.12: lord of the world creator of creators the saviour god who overcomes the foeman.
text.13: may gods bṛhaspati both aśvins shelter from ill this sacrifice and sacrificer.
text.14: foodful and muchinvoked at this our calling may the great bull vouchsafe us wide protection.
text.15: lord of bay coursers indra blew our children harm us not give us not as prey to others.
text.16: let those who are our foemen stay afar from us with indra and with agni we will drive them off.
text.17: vasus Ādityas rudras have exalted me made me farreaching mighty thinker sovran lord.
